notes.keyFeatures:
Headline and Sub-Headline
Array of CTA or clickable image
Change button color for array of CTA
Decline CTA 'SKIP'
Clicks redirects to Advertiser's page (new tab) and in Card tab progresses to next card
Ghost Zone for Endpoint URL
Specific Headline and Sub-Headline for 1st Ad Position
QuizIds for iframe to render properly
CTA Array with multi-targetURL functionality
CTA Array with varying font style per CTA button functionality
CTA Array with vary button color per CTA button functionality
notes.creativeAssetGroupFields:
headline
sub_headline
src
imageURL- to pull external URL to display image
videoSrc- to pull exernal URL to display videos/gif
cta_list to display array of ctas
font_color_cta_list to change array of cta buttons
cta_text: N/A
decline_cta_text to skip to next card
notes.html:
Tying Ghost zoneId and templateId. Changing templateId is tied to running Segments
There are quizIds that are tied to live site to allow for iframe to render properly
notes.general:
5/1/25: Template Complete and Ready for Use.
5/19/25: Updated to have specific Headline and Sub-Headline for 1st Ad Position
5/24: Addressed for Clicks to not count upon skip (decline CTA)
notes.objectives: This Template is tied to the TYP path. This includes the latest functionality of multi-target URL functionality and and varying the styles of each CTA button like font type and button color
